description:

His eyes are locked on every wiggle of her ass, every heave of her chest, what's a girl to do? TAKE HIS ASS AND PUNISH IT, that's what.
Jessica strips him down of his disgusting clothes, humiliating him in just his socks and sneakers. She spanks his ass til it's good and red then slides her hot fingers into his ass, stretching his hole out for her hungry cock. This gym queen then fucks him in every way his bro body can take. It's too bad Reed didn't stretch before he got there, cause Jessica gives him the fucking workout of a lifetime. Somebody's going to be very sore tomorrow...
title: Gym Bunny Gives Horny Voyeur What He Deserves
